name: @imgly/plugin-print-ready-pdfs-web
description: Print-Ready PDFs plugin for CE.SDK editor - PDF/X conversion and export functionality. Contains AGPL-3.0 licensed Ghostscript WASM.

scripts.build: pnpm run clean && pnpm _syncPnpm && pnpm exec node scripts/build.mjs
scripts.publish:latest: pnpm run build && pnpm publish --tag latest --access public
scripts.publish:next: pnpm run build && pnpm publish --tag next --access public
scripts.check:all: concurrently -n lint,type,pretty "pnpm run check:lint" "pnpm run check:types" "pnpm run check:pretty"
scripts.demo:dev: pnpm run build && node scripts/build-demo.mjs && cd demo-dist && python3 -m http.server 8080
scripts.test:browser: pnpm run build && playwright test test/browser-test.spec.ts
scripts.test:integration: bash scripts/setup-test-tools.sh && pnpm run build && vitest run
scripts.test:profiles: pnpm run build && vitest run profile-conversion
scripts.test:metadata: pnpm run build && vitest run metadata-validation
scripts.test:content: pnpm run build && vitest run content-preservation
scripts.test:all: pnpm run test:browser && pnpm run test:integration
